extendedInfo.description: "Accupedo Pedometer Widget made good walking buddies in our last tests." [Washington Post, 10/1/12] "Among cellphone apps the Accupedo pedometer widget for Android phones had the top spot." [LA Times, 12/28/11]Accupedo is an accurate Pedometer Widget that monitors your daily walking on the Home screen.  ++++ ATTENTION ++++ Your phone may not compatible with Accupedo. Some phones do not support the G-sensor in SLEEP (STANDBY, when screen is OFF) mode by those phone manufacturers. This is not a defect of this app. Accupedo is a free edition of Accupedo-Pro. An intelligent 3D motion recognition algorithm is embedded to track only walking patterns by filtering and ejecting out non walking activities. Accupedo counts your steps regardless of where you put your phone like your pocket, waist belt, or bag. Be healthy by setting up your daily goal and accurately monitoring your steps with Accupedo. ++++ Features  ++++â The intelligent algorithm starts tracking after 4 - 12 CONSECUTIVE steps, then stops and restarts automatically as you walk.â Customizable widget display modes: steps, distance, minutes, calories, and Trip A.â Daily log history: step counts, distance, calories, and walking time.â Customized power usage mode options for efficient power saving.â Daily active hour option for power saving.â Customized personal settings: sensitivity, metric/english, step distance, body weight, daily goal, etc.â Concise widget display on Home screen.â A âodometerâ function for steps (Trip A)â Resume/Pause/Resetâ Widget skin colors: black, blue, green, orange, pinkâ Screen on/off optionâ Email a daily log fileâ Manual step count addition and subtractionâ Language option: default and English ++++ Installation  ++++â After downloading, press and hold your finger on the EMPTY space of the Home screen. (If your Home screen is FULL of Apps, remove at least two adjacent App because Accupedo needs two App space to install it.) âAdd to Home screenâ menu will appear with options listing.â Select Widgets from the menu, and then select the widget named âAccupedoâ.â Try moving it around by pressing and holding your finger on the widget.â WATCH YOUTUBE FOR INSTALLATION VIDEO (Type in Accupedo)  for more information.  ++++  Notes  ++++ â It works only for an Android phone with G-sensor (accelerometer).â It performs best when the phone is on your waist belt.â Step count may not be accurate if you put your phone in loose fit pants due to the random movement your phone makes in the pocket.â The sensitivity of a phone can be different from others. So, choose a sensitivity level that works best for your phone.â Help and FAQ are built in the App.

reviews.title: not accurate
reviews.comment: this isnt accurate when walking with the phone in my hand and i\'m swinging my arms back and forth. it doesnt count any steps when it\'s in my hand. it works only when i have it in my purse or if i hold it up to my face and keep it there. cant this be fixed?
reviews.author: Kira Kashino

reviews.title: Compact and Efficient Info
reviews.comment: Nice pedometer app, would be nice if it automatically switched between running and walking instead of being a manual setting.  Seems to be relatively accurate, watch sensitivity setting.
reviews.author: Mathew Triplett

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Very accurate in any position, in a pocket or handheld.   Would be nice to have 1x1 widget with tiny fonts and steps/time display and jellybean lock screen widget..   Thanks a lot!
reviews.author: Max C.

reviews.title: Zero steps?
reviews.comment: Days where zero steps registered. Frustrating to see at the end of a day when I walked a lot.
reviews.author: Tina Day

reviews.title: Using daily, happily!
reviews.comment: Does a great job for my daily step tracking!  Uncertain about the \'step count\' results while bicycling though.  Would be great if it could detect, annotate and adjust step and calorie counts between walking and cycling.
reviews.author: Michael Biggerstaff

reviews.title: Not very happy
reviews.comment: When I take off my charger, its very often, the app stays in pause mode the whole day, except if I turn it on. I have Galaxy S3
reviews.author: Alexander Todorov

reviews.title: Counts steps taken
reviews.comment: Excellent app,  I\'ve started walking more to meet targets set. Just one issue ~ when I travel on my bike it captures that as well.
reviews.author: Ravi Nagrani

reviews.title: PLEASE IMPROVE!!
reviews.comment: I\'m a Weight Watcher and use this app daily to track activity. Two frustrating problems: some days show 0 steps even tho\' I walked a lot, and today it won\'t open (black screen). I like this app, but please improve reliability. Thanks.
reviews.author: C.N. Gordon

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Works as described from the first minute of installation. Five stars.
reviews.author: MSR Murthy

reviews.comment: A great app...accurate..versatile and great customer service...highly recommended...Liam
reviews.author: Liam Mulderry

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: After dinner I regularly go for walk..but from now on I started using this app and see how much my calories burn..:-)
reviews.author: Sumit Yadav

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: It\'s not very accurate as I\'ve noticed it will carry on counting when im driving or on the bus also it will miss a whole chunk of the day and you have to open the app up for it to start counting. It\'s okay for what I wanted it for
reviews.author: Naomi Gibbon

reviews.title: mguenther
reviews.comment: I really like this app, started using it on my daily walks.  I love the graphs.  My only problem is getting it to track mileage instead kilometers
reviews.author: mary guenther

reviews.title: Does what it should
reviews.comment: Really practical, loving it!
reviews.author: Nathalie Bertling

reviews.title: Great tracker
reviews.comment: This works great to keep track of all the walking I do. Couldn\'t ask for much better.
reviews.author: Chip Traum

reviews.title: Aggravating
reviews.comment: I am having issues with my widget. I have to keep uninstalling the app impeded to get my widget back. It will work fine one day and the next day it won\'t work. It will not even show up that I have the widget available, so I have to uninstall and reinstall the app to get it back. Without the widget it will not keep up with my steps. Will rate higher if the problem can ne fixed.
reviews.author: Jennifer Rainey

reviews.title: Not counting....
reviews.comment: It stops counting my steps or doesn\'t show I walked anywhere. Irritating, it used to work much better. I have used this many times and found something wrong with it everytime. It has shut my phone off, messed up settings and now it turns itself off, the app itself. Please fix. I love this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good for the price.
reviews.comment: This app works well as long as used as directed.  Pause mode DOES have a tendency to switch to active once in awhile. You can get around this by simply turning off the app when not in use which will prevent unwanted data logging. Probably better used as a regular pedometer rather than a so-called \'step counter\' due to this.  Accurate if properly calibrated and worn on hip as directed. I suspect most problems are user error. ;)  Samsung Galaxy S4
reviews.author: Dave Robbins

reviews.title: Skips
reviews.comment: I walked all over the park yesterday with this on and it counted only 100 steps????
reviews.author: Angie Castorena

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this app for a month an it is as good as the expensive pedometers I\'ve bought in the past. And it is always with you with no need to clip on a belt, etc.
reviews.author: Michael Horne
